meanings.definition: The act of representing something in a visual form.
meanings.sent1: The pictorialization of the story in the book helped me understand it better.
meanings.sent2: Artists often use pictorialization to capture the essence of their subjects.
meanings.sent3: The pictorialization of the cat wearing sunglasses made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her pictorialization of emotions through colors was truly captivating.
meanings.sent5: The pictorialization of the sunset was so vivid, it felt like I was there.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a visual representation of something.
meanings.sent1: The pictorialization of his dream involved drawing it out on paper.
meanings.sent2: Architects rely on pictorialization to bring their designs to life.
meanings.sent3: The pictorialization of the alien invasion was both thrilling and amusing.
meanings.sent4: Through her pictorialization, she turned ordinary scenes into masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: His pictorialization of the city skyline was so detailed, it looked real.

meanings.definition: The use of images or pictures to convey a message or idea.
meanings.sent1: In advertising, pictorialization plays a crucial role in attracting customers.
meanings.sent2: Children's books often rely on pictorialization to engage young readers.
meanings.sent3: The pictorialization of the warning sign with a smiley face was ironic.
meanings.sent4: The artist's pictorialization of nature's beauty left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The pictorialization of unity through diverse images was truly inspiring.
